comments.body:
DAC will be 2k and MRD has become CNR and vice versa (MRD is 50% fees and is based on CGPA and CNR is 40% fees and is based on SGPA)

MRD is given once per year and CNR is given once each semester
Have they even increased the percentage of students getting cnr now?

MRD and CNR will be calculated on full fees now and not on just tuition fees part.  
For example in my batch PESSAT total fees is 3.4L, but scholarship used to be calculated for 2.9L before, so it would come to 58k

From now it will be for full 3.4L, so it will increase to 68k
